Package com.intellij.tasks.impl

Class BaseRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.tasks.TaskRepository
      • com.intellij.tasks.impl.BaseRepository
        • com.intellij.tasks.impl.BaseRepositoryImpl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BugzillaRepository, FogBugzRepository, GenericRepository, JiraRepository, LighthouseRepository, MantisRepository, TracRepository, YouTrackRepository
    Deprecated. 
    Upgrade your clients to use Apache HttpClient 4.x or other transport libraries.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BaseRepositoryImpl
extends BaseRepository
    Base class for HTTP-based repositories functioning over Apache Commons HttpClient 3.1.

    Implementing new integrations using Apache Commons HttpClient 3.1 is not recommended as the library reached its end of life and is no longer being maintained. It's likely to be removed in future versions of IntelliJ platform.
